title: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
description: An open-world adventure where players control Link, exploring the kingdom of Hyrule to defeat Calamity Ganon.

title: Red Dead Redemption 2
description: A Western-themed action-adventure game following outlaw Arthur Morgan as he navigates the decline of the Wild West.

title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
description: Players control monster hunter Geralt of Rivia in a richly detailed fantasy world filled with quests and creatures.

title: God of War
description: A mythological action-adventure game where Kratos and his son Atreus journey through Norse realms.

title: Horizon Zero Dawn
description: Players control Aloy, a hunter in a world overrun by machines, uncovering her past and the fate of civilization.

title: Dark Souls III
description: An action role-playing game known for its challenging combat and intricate world design.

title: Persona 5
description: A Japanese RPG where players lead a double life as high school students and phantom thieves, combating supernatural threats.

title: Overwatch
description: A team-based multiplayer shooter featuring diverse heroes with unique abilities competing in objective-based modes.

title: Minecraft
description: A sandbox game allowing players to build and explore infinite worlds made of blocks, fostering creativity and survival skills.

title: Fortnite
description: A battle royale game where 100 players fight to be the last one standing, featuring building mechanics and vibrant visuals.

title: Grand Theft Auto V
description: An open-world crime saga following three protagonists in the fictional city of Los Santos.

title: The Last of Us Part II
description: A post-apocalyptic narrative-driven game exploring themes of revenge and redemption.

title: Animal Crossing: New Horizons
description: A life simulation game where players develop and customize a deserted island community.

title: Doom Eternal
description: A fast-paced first-person shooter where players battle demonic forces across various dimensions.

title: Half-Life: Alyx
description: A virtual reality first-person shooter set between the events of Half-Life and Half-Life 2.

title: Cyberpunk 2077
description: An open-world RPG set in a dystopian future where players navigate a city filled with cybernetic enhancements.

title: Among Us
description: A multiplayer social deduction game where crewmates work together to identify impostors within their ranks.

title: Fall Guys: Ultimate Knockout
description: A battle royale platformer where players compete in obstacle courses and mini-games to be the last one standing.

title: Catan
description: Players collect and trade resources to build roads, settlements, and cities on a modular board.

title: The Game of Life
description: Simulates a person's travels through their life, from early adulthood to retirement, with jobs, marriage, and possible children.

title: Cluedo
description: A murder-mystery game where players deduce who committed the crime, with what weapon, and in which room.

title: Codenames
description: Two teams compete to identify their agents based on one-word clues provided by their spymasters.

title: Ticket to Ride
description: Players collect train cards to claim railway routes connecting cities across North America.

title: Pandemic
description: A cooperative game where players work together to stop the spread of global pandemics.

title: Carcassonne
description: Players develop the area around the medieval fortified city of Carcassonne by strategically placing tiles.

title: Monopoly
description: Players buy, sell, and trade properties to bankrupt their opponents.

title: Risk
description: Players control armies to conquer territories and eliminate opponents.

title: Scrabble
description: Players use lettered tiles to create words and score points based on letter values.

title: Chess
description: A classic strategy game where two players move pieces with distinct rules to checkmate the opponent's king.

title: Settlers of Catan
description: Players collect and trade resources to build roads, settlements, and cities on a modular board.

title: Dixit
description: Players use abstract illustrations on cards to guess which image matches a storyteller's clue.

title: 7 Wonders
description: Players develop civilizations by drafting cards representing various structures and wonders.

title: Azul
description: Players take turns drafting colored tiles to decorate the walls of a Portuguese palace.

title: Terraforming Mars
description: Players compete to transform Mars into a habitable planet by managing resources and projects.

title: Scythe
description: Set in an alternate-history 1920s, players lead factions to conquer territory and build mechs.

title: Gloomhaven
description: A cooperative campaign game of tactical combat in a persistent fantasy world.

title: Clank!
description: A deck-building adventure game where players explore a dungeon to steal artifacts without making too much noise.

title: Uno
description: Players aim to be the first to score 500 points by discarding all their cards in various rounds.

title: Bridge
description: A trick-taking game played in partnerships, focusing on bidding and strategic play.

title: Hearts
description: Players aim to avoid certain cards that carry penalty points, particularly hearts and the queen of spades.

title: Spades
description: A trick-taking game where players bid the number of tricks they expect to take, aiming to meet their bid.

title: Cribbage
description: Players score points by forming combinations of cards, aiming to be the first to reach a target score.

title: Euchre
description: A trick-taking game with a trump suit, where players aim to win the majority of tricks.

title: Rummy
description: Players form sets or runs of cards to score points, aiming to be the first to deplete their hand.

title: Canasta
description: A Rummy variant where players aim to make melds of seven cards of the same rank.

title: Go Fish
description: Players ask opponents for specific cards to form pairs, aiming to collect the most pairs.

title: Old Maid
description: Players aim to form pairs and avoid being left with the unmatchable 'Old Maid' card.

title: War
description: A simple game where players flip cards, and the higher card wins the round; the goal is to collect all cards.

title: Spit
description: A fast-paced game where players simultaneously place cards in sequence, aiming to get rid of their deck first.

title: Speed
description: Players race to place cards from their hand onto two central piles, matching by number or suit.

title: Phase 10
description: Players complete specific card combinations, called phases, in order to progress through the game.

title: Pinochle
description: A trick-taking game where players score points by forming combinations of cards into melds.

title: Whist
description: A classic trick-taking game without bidding, aiming to win as many tricks as possible.

title: Skat
description: A German trick-taking game with bidding, where one player plays against the other two.
